title: Thank You for Your Order!
subtitle: Your order has been confirmed
message: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been received and processed successfully.
step1: You will receive a confirmation email with your order details.
step2: We will send you a tracking link as soon as your package is shipped.
step3: Track your order in real-time using the tracking link.
contactMessage: If you have any questions about your order, please don't hesitate to contact us.
specialOfferText: Get 10% off your next order with code THANK10
newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest collections and exclusive offers.
returnPolicyText: You have 14 days to return your item if it doesn't suit you.
